alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 01 at 8:46AM EDT until April 03 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...From this morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of around 18.7 feet tonight, before beginning to recede. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 8 PM EDT this evening.
